title: James Carville & Mary Matalin: "Love & War"
description: In Michael's first year at SiriusXM, he hosted a Book Club event at the SiriusXM NYC Studios in front of a live audience, with James Carville and Mary Matalin, on their book "Love & War: Twenty Years, Three Presidents, Two Daughters and One Louisiana Home." Original air date 9 January 2014. The book was published on 7 January 2014.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (James Carville, Mary Matalin, Michael Smerconish)
